name: about me
body:
# Activities

## FreeBSD Ports
I mainly maintain following ports.  To see information of my ports, visit [FreshPorts](http://www.freshports.org/search.php?stype=maintainer&method=match&query=meta%2Bports%40vmeta.jp&num=100&orderby=category&orderbyupdown=asc&search=Search). Some of my experimental ports haven't been included in official ports tree yet. See also [my redports repository](https://redports.org/browser/meta).
* TigerVNC - High-performance, platform-neutral implementation of VNC
* xrdp - Open source remote desktop protocol(rdp) server
* x11rdp - X11 server for xrdp

### Checking out my redports repository
x11rdp is still unofficial port. If you interested in x11rdp, please follow this instruction.

`$ svn checkout https://svn.redports.org/meta`

`$ cd x11-servers/x11rdp # x11rdp for xrdp-0.6.x, x11rdp-devel for xrdp-0.7.x`

`# make install`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
